text:
[Verse]
Sky is gray but we don’t care
We got moves that make them stare
Dancing till the morning light
Let the rain fall all night

[Verse 2]
Feet are splashing to the beat
Raindrops tapping on the street
Soaked but we are feeling fine
In the rain we shine

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh oh
Let the storm winds blow oh oh
Raindrops all around won’t slow
We just let it flow oh oh

[Bridge]
Laughing loud under the clouds
City lights feel like a crowd
Heartbeats syncing with the sound
Raindrops falling all around

[Verse 3]
Feel the chill but hearts are warm
Dancing through the lightning storm
Every step we take so free
Lost in rain and melody

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh oh
Let the storm winds blow oh oh
Raindrops all around won’t slow
We just let it flow oh oh
title: Dancing in the Rain
